CustomField.formula: IF ($Setup.Marlin_Configuration__c.Beneficial_Owner_Home_Address_Required__c , Contact__r.OtherStreet + ', ' + Contact__r.OtherCity + ', ' + TEXT (Contact__r.OtherStateCode) + ', ' + Contact__r.OtherPostalCode , IF (!ISBLANK (Contact__r.OtherStreet) ,Contact__r.OtherStreet + ', ' + Contact__r.OtherCity + ', ' + TEXT (Contact__r.OtherStateCode) + ', ' + Contact__r.OtherPostalCode ,Contact__r.MailingStreet + ', ' + Contact__r.MailingCity + ', ' + TEXT (Contact__r.MailingStateCode) + ', ' + Contact__r.MailingPostalCode) )
CustomField.label: Contact Full Address
